text: In common usage a fraction is any part of a unit. Fraction may also mean: *Fraction (mathematics), a quotient of numbers, e.g. "Â¾"; or, more generally, an element of a quotient field *Fraction (chemistry), a quantity of a substance collected by the separation process known as fractionation *Fraction (religion), the ceremonial act of breaking the bread during Christian Communion *Fraction (politics), a parliamentary party *Fraction (comic), a short-lived comic about the theft of a power suit
title: Fraction
